name: egraphql-fetch
description: Thin symmetrically encrypted GraphQL client powered by fetch

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit && (if-env ZUUL_ENABLED=true && npm run zuul || (if-env ZUUL_ENABLED=true && exit 1 || echo 'no zuul'))
scripts.preversion: npm run browser && git add index.min.js && git commit -m "updated min.js" || echo ''
scripts.browser: npm run browser-min && npm run browser-pack
scripts.browser-min: (echo '/*'; cat ./LICENSE; echo ' */') > index.min.js; browserify -g uglifyify index.js --standalone egraphqlFetch >> index.min.js
scripts.browser-pack: (echo '/*'; cat ./LICENSE; echo ' */') > index.pack.js; browserify --debug index.js --standalone egraphqlFetch >> index.pack.js

author: Martin Heidegger
